name: Hedgehog Twenty-Foured
description:
Survive a trap laden British forest as a hedgehog, who has felt threatened by the existence of Goodnature's A24 devices.

Based on the endangerment of British hedgehogs which are being prone to getting killed by A24s that have been deployed by New Zealand pest control manufacturer Goodnature under permission from the UK government and inspired by 38 Degrees' petition to stop said cruelty to rodents.
